# here are some plots

You can make some plots in the same way as always.

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

df = tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, 2, 5),
    y = 1 + 2 * x - .5 * x ^ 2 + rnorm(100)
)

df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
install.packages("p8105.datasets")
install.packages("plotly")
```

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r}
data("instacart", package = "p8105.datasets")
glimpse(instacart)
```

```{r}
instacart_df = instacart |>
  mutate(
    weekday = factor(order_dow, labels = c("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday")),
         hour_of_day = factor(order_hour_of_day)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(aisle_id))
```

```{r}
view(instacart_df)
```
